attributes.action: Be Gone Foul Caravan Of Hell
attributes.additional_details: There is a caravan somewhere that some bloke is WELL ANGRY about. He's made a facebook page and everything so you know he's dead serious. Here's the link so you can check out his perfectly justified and worthwhile campaign to get THE CARAVAN OF HELL moved. https://www.facebook.com/CaravanOfHell

rejection.details: E-petitions should clearly state what you are calling on central Government to do.
